湬字的基本解释

湬
qiū
古同“湫”。

湬
jiǎo
古同“湫”。

湬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiǎo］
［《廣韻》子了切，上篠，精。］
亦作“湬1”。
(1)低下。参见“湫隘”、“湫室”。
(2)见“湫戾”。
(3)春秋楚地名。在今湖北省钟祥县北。
[②]［jiū］
［《廣韻》即由切，平尤，精。］
亦作“湬2”。
(1)清静。
(2)凉貌。
(3)古水名。发源于山西省岚县西。今名湫水河。
(4)通“遒”。参见“湫2盡”。
[③]［qiū］
［《廣韻》七由切，平尤，清。］
亦作“湬3”。
(1)洞穴。
(2)深潭。
(3)凝集。参见“湫3底”。
(4)通“愁”。
[④]［jiù］
［《廣韻》在九切，上有，從。］
亦作“湬4”。
泄洪道。
[⑤]［jiāo］
［《集韻》兹消切，平宵，精。］
亦作“湬5”。
地名用字。夫湫。

湬字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　湬； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页638第11
【正字通】俗湫字。

湬字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
湬字的起名意思

暂无。

湬
Basic explanation of words
湬
qiū
Ancient Tong "Qiu".
湬
jiǎo
Ancient Tong "Qiu".
湬
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiǎo］
["Guang Yun" sub-cut, Shang Xiao, Jing. ]
Also known as "湬1".
(1) Low. See "Qiuai", "Qiushi".
(2) See "Qiuqu".
(3) The place names of Chunqiu Chu. In today's north of Zhongxiang County, Hubei Province.
[②]［jiū］
["Guangyun" is Yuqie, Pingyou, Jing. ]
Also known as "湬2".
(1) Quiet.
(2) Cool appearance.
(3) Ancient water names. Originated in the west of Lanxian County, Shanxi Province. Today's name is Qiushui River.
(4) Through "Yu". See "Qiu 2 End".
[③]［qiū］
["Guangyun" Qiyouqie, Pingyou, Qing. ]
Also known as "湬3".
(1) Cave.
(2) Deep pool.
(3) Agglutination. See "Qiu 3 bottom".
(4) Through "sorrow".
[④]［jiù］
["Guangyun" is in Jiuqie, there is on it, from. ]
Also known as "湬4".
Spillway.
[⑤]［jiāo］
["Ji Yun" is hereby cut, flat night, fine. ]
Also known as "湬5".
Place names in words. Huqiu.
湬
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　湬; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 638 No. 11
【Zhengzitong】vulgar Qiu characters.
